coe.subtitle: Where expertise meets advanced care.
coe.title: Center of Excellence
coe.description: At Badran Hospital, our Centers of Excellence represent the highest level of specialized medical care. Led by top consultants and supported by advanced technology, each center delivers trusted outcomes and exceptional patient experiences across our key specialties.

cardiology.title: Cardiology
cardiology.description: Advanced heart care with top cardiologists and state-of-the-art diagnostics.
cardiology.subDescription: The Cardiology Center provides comprehensive cardiac services that covering early detection, advanced treatment, and 24/7 emergency support. Our specialists use the latest technologies to ensure accurate assessments and timely interventions.

oncology.title: Oncology
oncology.description: Compassionate cancer care powered by expert oncologists and evidence-based treatment pathways.
oncology.subDescription: Our Oncology Center offers full-spectrum cancer management with a strong focus on patient safety, comfort, and emotional support. We combine accurate diagnostics, modern therapies, and multidisciplinary follow-up programs.

oneDaySurgery.title: One-Day Surgery
oneDaySurgery.description: Efficient, safe surgical procedures enabling same-day discharge with expert medical supervision.
oneDaySurgery.subDescription: The One-Day Surgery Center is designed for procedures that allow patients to return home the same day. With streamlined workflows, modern operating rooms, and dedicated recovery care, we ensure safety, comfort, and continuity.

generalSurgery.title: General Surgery
generalSurgery.description: Safe, effective surgical care delivered by experienced surgeons using modern, evidence-based techniques.
generalSurgery.subDescription: The General Surgery Center provides comprehensive surgical services for a wide range of conditions. Our approach prioritizes patient safety, precise surgical outcomes, and coordinated pre- and post-operative care.

gastroenterology.title: Gastroenterology
gastroenterology.description: Expert digestive health care with advanced endoscopy and fast, safe procedures.
gastroenterology.subDescription: The Gastroenterology Center provides complete diagnostic and therapeutic services for diseases of the stomach, intestines, liver, pancreas, and biliary system—supported by modern endoscopy suites and strict sterilization protocols.

services.subtitle: Comprehensive Care for Every Need
services.title: Our Medical Services
services.description: At Badran Hospital, we offer a full range of medical services designed to provide accurate diagnosis, effective treatment, and continuous care. From emergency response to advanced surgeries, our departments work together to ensure every patient receives the highest standard of medical attention and comfort.

surgery.title: Surgery Department
surgery.description: Our surgical team combines decades of experience with advanced techniques to ensure safe, successful procedures.

icu.title: Intensive Care Unit (ICU)
icu.description: Equipped with state-of-the-art monitoring systems, our ICU provides 24/7 critical care for patients who need continuous observation and specialized medical attention.

inpatient.title: Inpatient Clinics
inpatient.description: Safe, comfortable, and closely monitored recovery. Our inpatient department provides 24/7 medical supervision and a supportive healing environment for patients who require extended care or post-surgery recovery.

outpatient.title: Outpatient Clinics
outpatient.description: Our clinics bring together leading specialists across multiple fields to provide accurate diagnosis, follow-up, and personalized treatment for every patient.

laboratory.title: Laboratory Services
laboratory.description: Our fully equipped lab delivers reliable test results with precision and speed, supporting doctors in accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.

emergency.title: Emergency Department (ER)
emergency.description: Our emergency unit operates 24/7 with a dedicated medical team ready to respond quickly to urgent and critical cases.

dayCase.title: Day Case Unit
dayCase.description: For procedures that require no overnight stay, our Day Case Unit ensures comfort, safety, and a quick recovery that allowing patients to return home the same day.

radiology.title: Radiology Department
radiology.description: Using advanced imaging technologies such as CT, MRI, and digital X-ray, our radiology department supports fast and precise diagnosis for all medical conditions.

sections.intro: Badran Hospital is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the confidentiality of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you interact with our website, services, and medical facilities.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.content:
We may collect the following types of information:

- Personal Information: Name, contact details.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content:
Your information is used for purposes including:

- Providing medical care and services.
- Scheduling appointments and sending reminders.
- Communicating health updates or educational content.
- Improving our services and website experience.
- Complying with legal or regulatory requirements.

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
infoSharing.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your information only:

- With medical professionals involved in your care.
- With service providers who help us operate our systems, under strict confidentiality agreements.
- As required by law or regulatory authorities.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical, administrative, and physical safeguards to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, or loss.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
You have the right to:

- Access your personal and medical information.
- Request corrections or updates to your data.
- Request deletion of non-essential data, subject to legal and medical obligations.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Updates will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.content:
By accessing our website, you agree to use it only for lawful purposes. You may not:

- Upload harmful, offensive, or illegal content.
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.
- Interfere with the website's operation or other users' access.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including text, images, and videos, is the property of Badran Hospital and is protected under copyright laws. Unauthorized use or reproduction is prohibited.

appointmentPolicies.title: Appointment and Service Policies
appointmentPolicies.content:
- Appointments should be booked in advance. Walk-ins are accepted based on availability.
- Cancellation or rescheduling should be communicated at least 24 hours in advance.
- Patients must provide accurate personal and medical information for proper care.

healthDisclaimer.title: Health Information Disclaimer
healthDisclaimer.content: The content on our website is for general informational purposes only and does not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare provider for medical concerns.

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: Badran Hospital is not liable for damages resulting from the use or inability to use our website or services, except as required by applicable law.

changesToPolicies.title: Changes to Policies
changesToPolicies.content: We reserve the right to modify these policies at any time. Updates will be posted on our website.
